alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Jo Daviess; Stephenson; Whiteside (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued August 07 at 11:00AM CDT until further notice by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Portions of northwest Illinois and Iowa, including the following counties, in northwest Illinois, Carroll, Jo Daviess, Stephenson and Whiteside. In Iowa, Benton, Buchanan, Clinton, Delaware, Dubuque, Jackson, Jones and Linn. * WHEN...Through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Passing thunderstorms with rainfall rates of 1 to 2 inches per hours may result in flash flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Locally very heavy rainfall that has already fallen this morning and the chance for more thunderstorms with heavy rain again tonight, may result in flash flooding.
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
